籤詩版本二:
Masika akubwera, maluwa akuphuka pakhonde, ndipo magalimoto oyenda mtunda wa makilomita zikwi zambiri akubweretsa chuma.
Mukapeza funde lachitatu la Yumen, lidzakhala ngati bingu pansi
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira chithunzi chokumana ndi mfumu kukhoti.
Zonse ndi zabwino kwambiri.
解曰:
Mfumuyo inasankhidwa. Monga chuma chopezeka muumphawi. Tsatirani mtima wanu. Yoyamba mwa ma hexagrams.
Chizindikirochi chimatsatira chikhumbo cha mtima wanu. Zonse zili bwino.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ma yuan atatu pabizinesi
Shang Ren (1414-1486), dzina laulemu Hongzai, dzina loti Suting, yemwe adamwalira pambuyo pake Wenyi, anali mbadwa ya Chun'an, Zhejiang, China. Adabadwa pa February 25, chaka chakhumi ndi chiwiri cha Yongle mu Ming Dynasty.
Bambo ake kapena makolo ake sanali akuluakulu, koma ankakondedwa kwambiri ndi katswiri wamaphunziro Wang Rui ali wamng’ono. , iye analephera mayeso kangapo, choncho anadzipereka kwambiri pophunzira ku Taixue, ndipo ankakondedwa kwambiri ndi Imperial Academy. ), kenako adakhala woyamba pamayeso a Palace (Zhuangyuan). Mu Ming Dynasty, Huang Guan yekha ndi iye, omwe adachotsedwa ndi Zhu Di, anali ndi ulemu umenewu.
聖意: Zabwino m'nyumba, mwayi, zabwino mubizinesi, zabwino muukwati, kupambana mu Liujia, uthenga wabwino kwa apaulendo, uthenga wabwino m'minda, mphutsi za silika, zoweta zolemera, kupeza anthu, kubwezera, milandu, kupambana, kusamuka, zabwino. mwayi mu matenda, Anshan manda
第X籤: Chizindikiro makumi asanu ndi atatu mphambu zisanu ndi chimodzi
